answers.answer: Dear Bobby:Sorry that your having problems with your bladder.  I am assuming that your testing has been normal, brain MRI, labs etc?  Autonomic dysfunction involving just the sacral plexus is abit unusual.  This would be especially true with normal MRIs of brain and spine and no other dysautonmic features anywhere else.  Is your problem with only the bladder?  Is it retention, or frequency?  Is sexual dysfunction the ability to have an erection? or organsim? or general satisfaction?  Do you have other dysfunction such as spincter function?  Paresthesias in a dermatome distribution?  So, you can tell that over the internet I am not able to help much.  As far as the 3 best uro-neurologist?  I think you need to start at the best teaching medical hospital/medical school related hospital in your area.  Otherwise, major institutions such as Mass General, UCLA, UCSF, Emory, Cleveland Clinic, etc are good spots for autonmic dysfunction.Sorry that I am not much help.Sincerely,CCF Neuro MD
